first_post: No ideas have been posted to the creativity session. Your idea will be the first!

CREATE.create_from_idea_title: Would you like to create a creativity session on ‟{{idea}}” ?
CREATE.helper: A creativity session helps rejuvenate the discussion by exposing participants to disruptive questions.

HOME.question_placeholder: This issue will be visible above the card
HOME.question_title: Write a question which participants would react to
HOME.empty_question: Please add a question in the edit menu
HOME.idea_prompt: This question is relative to the idea ‟{{parentIdeaTitle}}”. Please try to answer the question, by using one of the cards below to find inspiration:

RATE.rateIdeaTitle: Do you want to send them to ‟{{title}}”
